rule: The output must contain a section labeled "Company names" followed by a colon and a comma-separated list of company names extracted from the given text.
input: The collaboration between Google and Facebook was documented in the latest tech news.
output:
Extract the important entities mentioned in the text below. First extract all company names, then extract all people names, then extract specific topics that fit with content, and finally extract general overarching themes

Desired format:
Company names: <comma_separated_list_of_company_names>
People names: -|||||-|||||
Specific topics: -|||||-|||||
General themes: -|||||-|||||
evaluation:
The output begins with repeating the description to extract important entities and mentions the order in which the entities should be extracted. It also specifies the desired format in a similar manner to the description. However, there is an error in the format of the desired output. The separator used between items in lists is depicted as "-|||||-|||||" instead of the expected "<comma_separated_list>". This represents a non-compliance with the description of the desired output format.

Mention the reason for violation and your thinking went into coming up with it.
ERR
